thread.title: 2nd time staying here (April 2016), and I loved it - great feng shui
thread.title_full: 2nd time staying here (April 2016), and I loved it - great feng shui - Review of Cosmopolita Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: RLC846
title: 2nd time staying here (April 2016), and I loved it - great feng shui
text:
This is a cosy old building with high ceilings, classical decor and a charming layout...my 2nd time staying here. My room this time was larger, and overlooked a courtyard. I thought it was charming.
I slept very well here too.
There is something lovely about this hotel...the location, the layout of the rooms, the overall ambience, I can't specify what. The food tastes great here too!
It's in a fantastic location too, so close to the centre of Ancient Rome. Possibly my favourite hotel anywhere!
